詌字的基本解释

詌
gàn
口闭。

詌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gàn］
［《集韻》古暗切，去勘，見。］
(1)口闭。
(2)通“鉗”。恶。《荀子·哀公》：“魯哀公問於孔子曰：'請問取人？'孔子對曰：'無取健，無取詌，無取口啍。'健，貪也；詌，亂也；口啍，誕也。”杨倞注：“《家語》作'無取鉗'，王肅云：'謂妄對不謹誠者。'或曰：捷給鉗人之口者。”刘师培补释：“詌通鉗，亂也。'無取詌'，即無取殘惡之人也。”一说，同“拑”。说详清郝懿行《荀子补注》。

詌字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詌； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1154第12
【集韻】古暗切，音紺。口閉也。【荀子·哀公篇】無取詌詌亂也。【註】義未詳。【家語】作鉗。

詌字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
詌字的起名意思

暂无。

詌
Basic explanation of words
詌
gàn
Mouth closed.
詌
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gàn］
["Jiyun" ancient secretly cut, go to survey, see. ]
(1) Mouth is closed.
(2) Through "pliers". evil. "Xunzi·Aigong": "Lu Aigong asked Confucius:'May I take people?' Confucius said to him:'There is no health, no 詌, no taking a mouth.' Kin, greedy; 詌, chaos; mouth Mouth, birthday." Yang Jie's note: "The Family Language is written as'no tongs', and Wang Suyun:'I say that those who are not honest and unreasonable.' Or say: the one who is quick to grasp the mouth." Liu Shipei added: "Chuntong tongs, chaos.'No take care of 驌', that is, no one who takes the cruel evil." One said, the same as "clamping." Explain in detail Hao Yixing's "Xunzi Supplementary Note".
詌
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youji 1】【Words Department】　詌; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 1154-12
[Jiyun] Ancient dark cut, cyanotic tone. Mouth is also closed. [Xunzi·Ai Gong Chapter] There is no chaos. [Note] The meaning is not specified. [Home language] For pliers.
